name: Association of Independent Schools of Florida
description: AISF promotes and supports independent schools throughout Florida, providing accreditation services that ensure member schools maintain high standards of educational excellence. AISF focuses on non-sectarian independent schools committed to academic rigor and innovative education.
recognition: AISF accreditation is recognized by the Florida Department of Education and accepted by colleges and universities nationwide.

links.label: AISF
links.description: Association of Independent Schools of Florida
